programme.desc: A policeman ruthlessly goes after a drug syndicate to avenge his girlfriend, who was abducted and tortured by one of its members.

programme.desc: The story of two lovestruck teens, Vince (Joshua Garcia) and Kath (Julia Barretto), plays out through text messages.

programme.title: Fareed Zakaria GPS: Sunday, November 23, 2025 10AM
programme.desc: Fareed Zakaria brings viewers his insights and analysis, and interviews world leaders, artists, scientists, business leaders, global affairs analysts and other cultural observers for the 'Global Public Square.'

programme.title: African Voices Playmakers: Warrior Women
programme.desc: Larry Madowo meets two trailblazing women redefining strength and resilience. Somali-born boxer Ramla Ali rose from refugee to Olympic athlete and advocate, using her platform to empower women worldwide. In Lagos, Nigerian police officer Juliet Ukah breaks barriers as the first African woman signed to the Professional Fighters League, proving that true warriors fight for more than victory.

programme.title: Marketplace Africa: Nigeria E1 Boat Racing/Developing Nigeria's Waterways; Samer Kassem/Marketplace Europe: World Travel Market
programme.desc: In Lagos Nigeria, 17% of the state is composed of waterways and lagoons. But water transportation is highly underutilized, despite poor road infrastructure and traffic congestion. Now, the state actively seeking to develop its waterways network through public ferries and private operators as well as a partnership with the international boat racing franchise E1, with the first African E1 event taking place in October. E1 is also looking to grow their presence on the continent through digital education and outreach, something that is launching in tandem with the event in October. We take a look at the challenges and opportunities of developing Lagos' waterways, and the potential economic boost of tapping into the region's blue economy. Also, Aspen Global CEO Samer Kassem sits down to discuss the biopharmaceutical giant's growth strategy and the markets he believes will grow in the coming years./The World Travel Market unites industry leaders to take on the biggest challenges and trends in global tourism. From AI and sustainability, to customer service and changing traveler demands, we speak to some of the key figures in European travel to find out how our vacations will evolve in the coming years.

programme.title: Intelligent Future: Intellligent Future - Abu Dhabi: City of the Future
programme.desc: The world's smartest cities are built on an audacious blend of creativity, investment and foresight. As Abu Dhabi redesigns itself, we discover how transformative technologies are reshaping the way cities work, move, and sustain themselves. Becky Anderson explores the innovations driving her home's rise on the global Smart City Index,. We go behind the scenes for the launch of the latest version of TAMM, the world's first transactional AI servant streamlining 1,100 public services, explore Presight's smart city systems, and visit Masdar City, where new technologies like VOLT's home energy storage are powering a sustainable future.

programme.title: Inside Africa: ?Inside Africa's 25th Anniversary: Lupita & Angelique at the Met
programme.desc: As part of?Inside Africa's?25th anniversary, we have a sit-down between two of the continent's most celebrated voices: Angelique Kidjo?and Lupita Nyong'o. The setting is The Met's newly reimagined?Arts of Africa?gallery, a powerful space in which to reflect on African creativity, identity, and legacy. Five-time Grammy award winning Kidjo and Oscar-winning actor Nyong'o reflect on their careers and the rise and influence of African culture across the world.

programme.title: You Are The Best!
programme.desc: What is the warmest, happiest, most deeply touching word in the world? "Mom!" Swept up into the tempest of a new life after her father's death, the youngest daughter of this family begins a search for happiness with her mother.

programme.title: You Are The Best!
programme.desc: What is the warmest, happiest, most deeply touching word in the world? "Mom!" Swept up into the tempest of a new life after her father's death, the youngest daughter of this family begins a search for happiness with her mother.

programme.title: Two Days and One Night 4
programme.desc: Two-day road trip to the beautiful spots in all the corners of Korea! Instead of fancy studio, this on-the-road reality show takes place in the rural sides. While over 10 million Koreans travel abroad each year, the "2 Days and 1 Night" casts travel around Korea - to the mountains, farms, fishing villages, islands - where you can meet the welcoming smiles of our neighbors and the beautiful nature that cleanse our eyes.

programme.title: The Return of Superman
programme.desc: Parenting challenges of "Superman" , the first hero that children encounter when they are born.

programme.title: Our Golden Days
programme.desc: Everyone has their golden days. Whether now, in the past, or the future. A heartfelt family melodrama that resonates across generations, exploring those dazzling days we all encounter with different meanings.

programme.title: My Neighbor, Charles
programme.desc: Foreigners who have left their familiar worlds behind and come to the unfamiliar land of Korea! A vivid, real-life adaptation story of foreigners trying to settle into Korean society for various reasons. This reality program warmly portrays their concerns about jobs, marriage, and parenting while living in Korea.

programme.title: Music Bank
programme.desc: The best tunes in Korea! the most sensational music show on TV satisfies all your senses! Fantastic performances and Awe-inspiring harmony by the nation's top musicians! Follow the latest trend in the Korean music scene through the K-chart, a summary of the week's hottest songs.

programme.title: Hello Monster
programme.desc: I find my true self through you. A man and a woman meet again at a crime scene - like sworn enemies. They get to work together to solve the crime concealing their true intentions. Then, they fall in love with each other and starts to find their identities.

programme.title: Marie and Her Three Daddies
programme.desc: Marie's turbulent journey to find her father leads to the birth of an eccentric new family, one that proves stronger than blood and more persistent than DNA.

programme.title: A Graceful Liar
programme.desc: A bold yet heartbreaking story of a mother and daughter-in-law who meet through marriage and wage a war of lies to seize the Geonhyang family, struggling for a dramatic reversal of fortune.

programme.title: Are You Human?
programme.desc: A young man falls into a coma. His mother creates an artificial intelligence robot in his likeness that must pretend to be a real human and fool people into believing that he's real until the real son wakes up. He is placed in the midst of a fierce power struggle of a business mogul family in the young man's stead. There's a woman who protects him as a bodyguard but doesn't even know if he's a human or a robot!

programme.title: Xena: Warrior Princess S2 E08 - Ten Little Warlords

programme.title: CSI S4 E03 - Homebodies
programme.desc: Season 4 begins with terrific back-to-back episodes involving serial killers ("Assume Nothing" / "For All Our Country"). There's a new politically minded sheriff in town and in "Invisible Evidence" he's ticked off that the CSI's can't get enough evidence to convict a rapist/murderer. Also, Nick and Sara buck for the same promotion. Along the way there are plenty of quirky cases: one involving a museum robbery ("Suckers") and one involving a dead juror ("Eleven Angry Jurors"). Grissom travels to a small town with plenty of secrets to solve a murder in "Jackpot," Catherine dates a younger man in "Early Rollout," and Sara works a case involving a woman strikingly similar to herself in "Butterflied." There's also plenty of kinkiness in "Fur and Loathing" and tragedy "Bad Words."

programme.desc: Alton Brown takes a deep dive on shakshuka by way of a famous film from the 1940s. He also takes a closer look at preserved lemons and homemade harissa.

programme.title: Good Eats (S15)
programme.desc: Alton Brown journeys through the history and science of the greatest of all raw meat dishes: steak tartare. Plus, he serves up a delicious ahi tuna poke.

programme.title: Guy's All-American Road Trip (S2)
programme.desc: Guy Fieri and his caravan start their epic journey through Appalachia with an ice cream-making contest at a dairy and a pizza showdown at the campground.

programme.title: The Kitchen (S38)
programme.desc: Jeff Mauro is making wings two ways with Fried Honey Miso Wings and Oven Baked Sweet and Spicy Cherry Pepper Wings.

programme.title: Help My Yelp (S1)
programme.desc: Monti helps a dwindling Georgia BBQ restaurant break their bad habits.

programme.title: Help My Yelp (S1)
programme.desc: Monti Carlo discovers staff taking shots at the bar at a well-established restaurant in Atlanta.

programme.title: Guilty Pleasures (S2)
programme.desc: Celebrities expose their favorite fried guilty pleasures.

programme.title: Guilty Pleasures (S2)
programme.desc: Food Network stars travel coast-to-coast to share their guilty pleasures.

programme.title: Halloween Wars (S15)
programme.desc: For their final challenge, the last two teams standing must create a scene that shows a modern-day spell being cast and includes one special effect.

programme.title: Beach Bites With Katie Lee (S2)
programme.desc: Katie Lee hunts for dishes and restaurants that are off the beaten path.

programme.title: Tournament Of Champions (S6)
programme.desc: Guy Fieri continues the Tournament of Champions VI first-round battles with four more intense one-on-one sudden death matches.

programme.title: Man V. Food (S6)
programme.desc: Lake Tahoe provides a stunning backdrop as Casey Webb explores the area's best eats. He finds a complete dinner in a bun and a Greek comfort food staple.

programme.title: Man V. Food (S6)
programme.desc: Casey Webb heads to Las Vegas, NV. He gambles on grilled cheese, tackles a towering sushi creation and faces the Kasespatzle Challenge at a German beer hall.

programme.desc: For their final challenge, the last two teams standing must create a scene that shows a modern-day spell being cast and includes one special effect.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Nating Hagkan Ang Nakaraan (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Helen looks like a woman who has everything anybody could want-a beautiful house, a loving husband, and a baby on the way.

programme.title: Tong-Its
programme.desc: Two popular figures in the local music scene, pop singer, Janno Gibbs and master rapper, Francis Magalona teamed up in this comedy about two cops who enjoyed playing a game Tong-its, a popular type of card game.

programme.title: Hindi Pahuhuli Ng Buhay (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: An assassination attempt by rebels on a police officer was foiled by ex-convict Robin.

programme.title: Ang Misis Kong Hoodlum
programme.desc: When Andy marries Grace, he is surprised to discover that her family are staying with them. Andy becomes the "house-band" and serves his wife and her family.

programme.title: Ex-Army
programme.desc: Lt. Emil Medrano is a bemedalled military officer assigned to infiltrate the communist movement. On his way to the movement's stronghold, he becomes involved in an encounter between soldiers and the rebels.

programme.title: Isa, Dalawa, Tatlo, Ang Tatay Kong Kalbo
programme.desc: Medel (Bembol Roco) is a pretty thief who gives his earnings to his neighbors who need it. But hid felonious activities stop when he marries Frieda (Beth Bautista) and adopts Bimbo (Nio Mulach).

programme.title: Isinakdal Ko Ang Aking Ina
programme.desc: Can a mother forsake her child? She is a doctor, who almost has everything but despite her wealth, she is not happy. Unknown to her, the son shes looking for is the very man who has been driving her around.

programme.title: Bakit Bughaw Ang Langit?
programme.desc: Why is the sky blue? Why do we love the people we love? These are questions no one can answer. Because is just is.

programme.title: Ikaw Lang
programme.desc: A librarian's husband turn out to be psychotically abusive. When the husband mistakenly thinks he has killed her, he dumps her in a river. In need of help to take revenge, she hooks up with a bank robber and together they kill him.

programme.title: Pilya
programme.desc: Ditas has the body of a full-grown adult but her sense is that of a child. Although she exists in an environment where vulgarity is deemed normal, she maintains her wide-eyed innocence.

programme.title: The Untouchable Family
programme.desc: Ma Barker and sons Mad Max, Machinegun Nonong and Pretty Boy Fredo want to be the number one criminal family in the land.

programme.title: Aso't Pusa (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Pamboy (Tito Sotto) risked being beaten to a pulp by Osang's father each time he came to defend the girl. He tried to convince to leave, but Osang (Aiza Seguerra) continued to show her love for her father even after he went into jail.

programme.title: Kosa
programme.desc: Two convicts develop a close friendship because of their common goal which was to exact revenge for their loved ones. Their obssession of getting back at their enemies drove them to escape and to alienate all the people around them including their fellow inmates.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We meet Afghani Gulhabib Habiby who takes care of cattle on a farm in Kanoya, Kagoshima Prefecture, and Nepalese Rukesh Raj Giri who runs a produce store in Tokyo.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: OKINAWA: Shuri Castle
programme.desc: Okinawa Prefecture is a group of subtropical islands in the far south of Japan. We examine its past and present, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: Shuri Castle.

programme.title: BOSAI: Science that Can Save Your
programme.desc: Massive logistics facilities underpin online retail, but their robust warehouse structures, state-of-the-art seismic isolation systems and other features make them suitable as evacuation sites too.

programme.title: Activate Your Japanese!
programme.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on "senpai" in Japan.

programme.title: The Comedy Club Where I Belong
programme.desc: In a stand-up comedy club in Tokyo, people from all over the world try out bilingual jokes. For James from Australia, comedy has changed his life, helping him find a place where he feels he belongs.

programme.title: HELLO! NHK WORLD-JAPAN
programme.desc: A sumo tournament is being held in London for the first time in 34 years. At a screening of Grand Sumo Legends, Wajima: The Golden Left, attendees can learn about NHK WORLD-JAPAN's useful services.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: CINEMATIC JOURNEY
programme.desc: Kyle Card hikes along the 1000km trail following the Pacific Coast in northern Japanwhere he discovers local lifestyles, stunning nature, traces of the area's 2011 disaster, and resilient people.

programme.title: The Masterpieces of Tsutaju
programme.desc: This miniseries presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyo-e producer of the Edo period. This episode takes a close look at artist Utamaro's iconic "Woman with a Glass Noisemaker."

programme.title: Seasoning the Seasons
programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: The World Heritage Sites in Japan
programme.desc: From natural landscapes to historic architecture representing centuries of cultural development, Japan's World Heritage sites offer a wide range of glimpses into history and the beauty of nature.

programme.title: YONEZAWA: A Gift from Melted Snow
programme.desc: As snow melts in Yonezawa, it provides water used for growing rice. Beautiful time-lapse images show how a 400-year-old brewery turns this rice into sake, using human expertise instead of machines.

programme.title: Darwin's Amazing Animals
programme.desc: Japanese pond turtles are a near-threatened species. But a six-month tracking project revealed that they flourish in rice paddies, woods and fields. Take a close look at their surprising lives.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: On New Year's Eve, performers dress as monsters called namahage. It's a good-natured tradition that strengthens family and community bonds. And in the village of Tayazawa, it was recently revived.

programme.title: JAPAN DELISH 5min.
programme.desc: Japanese festival favorite, yakisoba! Noodles cooked in a special sauce. Enjoy local yakisoba from all over Japan!

programme.title: Nun's Cookbook
programme.desc: The temple chefs make butterbur miso. Just boil butterbur shoots, then grind with sugar, mirin and white miso. The taste is slightly bitter, but perfect for early spring.

programme.title: GRAND SUMO Highlights
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from November 23, Day 15 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Fukuoka.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Nun's Seasonal Calendar
programme.desc: In this episode, we learn about ritto and shosetsu, two dates of early winter. The nuns teach us how to make seasonal pickles and dumplings.

programme.title: The Beauty of Japanese Swords
programme.desc: Japanese swords, admired since ancient times for their beauty, are amazing works of art. This time, Odachi, a giant sword that showcases a swordsmith's astonishing expertise.

programme.title: Time-lapse Journey
programme.desc: Iwate Prefecture is home to many historic sites which were made to represent Buddhist paradise. Catch a glimpse of eternity through time-lapse photography.

programme.title: Herbal Symphony #5
programme.desc: In Uda, discover Japan's oldest private medicinal herb garden, where the natural landscape from 300 years ago is preserved in a botanical time capsule, a sanctuary of the local culture and history.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Nakahara Sachiko translates the looks of popular Japanese anime and manga characters into costumes for live-action adaptations. She talks about making an impact on the global stage.

programme.title: Hit the Road 5minutes Fukushima
programme.desc: Take a drive in Fukushima! 13 years since the disaster, see its rejuvenated community and daily life. Visit the rest stop emblematic of this resilience and sense the locals' unyielding spirit.

programme.title: JAPAN FROM ABOVE: UP CLOSE
programme.desc: This program takes you on an aerial journey across 21st century Japan. Enjoy the bird's-eye view of unique landscapes as well as intimate portraits of the people who inhabit the archipelago.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE: Summer Delicacy
programme.desc: A group of anglers stand in a fast-moving, undulating river at the foot of a rugged cliff. They use "drifting mosquito hooks" to fish for a summer delicacy that was a favorite of the Edo townspeople.

programme.desc: We meet Afghani Gulhabib Habiby who takes care of cattle on a farm in Kanoya, Kagoshima Prefecture, and Nepalese Rukesh Raj Giri who runs a produce store in Tokyo.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: On New Year's Eve, performers dress as monsters called namahage. It's a good-natured tradition that strengthens family and community bonds. And in the village of Tayazawa, it was recently revived.

programme.title: JAPAN DELISH 5min.
programme.desc: Japanese festival favorite, yakisoba! Noodles cooked in a special sauce. Enjoy local yakisoba from all over Japan!

programme.title: Nun's Cookbook
programme.desc: The temple chefs make butterbur miso. Just boil butterbur shoots, then grind with sugar, mirin and white miso. The taste is slightly bitter, but perfect for early spring.

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: Tsuchida Hiromi has photographed the everyday lives of people who survived the atomic bombing of Hiroshima, decades apart. Now, 80 years after the bombing, what fresh realities will he capture?

programme.title: Satoyama Kitchen Fall #8
programme.desc: At the Satoyama Kitchen guesthouse in Hida Takayama, chef Nobuko, her cameraman husband Makoto and their cat Tama take us on a tasty journey of local cuisine served with a side of seasonal scenery.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Nun's Seasonal Calendar
programme.desc: In this episode, we learn about ritto and shosetsu, two dates of early winter. The nuns teach us how to make seasonal pickles and dumplings.

programme.title: The Beauty of Japanese Swords
programme.desc: Japanese swords, admired since ancient times for their beauty, are amazing works of art. This time, Odachi, a giant sword that showcases a swordsmith's astonishing expertise.

programme.title: Time-lapse Journey
programme.desc: Iwate Prefecture is home to many historic sites which were made to represent Buddhist paradise. Catch a glimpse of eternity through time-lapse photography.

programme.title: Activate Your Japanese!
programme.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on "senpai" in Japan.

programme.title: The Comedy Club Where I Belong
programme.desc: In a stand-up comedy club in Tokyo, people from all over the world try out bilingual jokes. For James from Australia, comedy has changed his life, helping him find a place where he feels he belongs.

programme.title: HELLO! NHK WORLD-JAPAN
programme.desc: A sumo tournament is being held in London for the first time in 34 years. At a screening of Grand Sumo Legends, Wajima: The Golden Left, attendees can learn about NHK WORLD-JAPAN's useful services.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: CINEMATIC JOURNEY
programme.desc: Kyle Card hikes along the 1000km trail following the Pacific Coast in northern Japanwhere he discovers local lifestyles, stunning nature, traces of the area's 2011 disaster, and resilient people.

programme.title: The Masterpieces of Tsutaju
programme.desc: This miniseries presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyo-e producer of the Edo period. This episode takes a close look at artist Utamaro's iconic "Woman with a Glass Noisemaker."

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Nakahara Sachiko translates the looks of popular Japanese anime and manga characters into costumes for live-action adaptations. She talks about making an impact on the global stage.

programme.title: Hit the Road 5minutes Fukushima
programme.desc: Take a drive in Fukushima! 13 years since the disaster, see its rejuvenated community and daily life. Visit the rest stop emblematic of this resilience and sense the locals' unyielding spirit.

programme.title: JAPAN FROM ABOVE: UP CLOSE
programme.desc: This program takes you on an aerial journey across 21st century Japan. Enjoy the bird's-eye view of unique landscapes as well as intimate portraits of the people who inhabit the archipelago.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE: Summer Delicacy
programme.desc: A group of anglers stand in a fast-moving, undulating river at the foot of a rugged cliff. They use "drifting mosquito hooks" to fish for a summer delicacy that was a favorite of the Edo townspeople.

programme.title: Today's Close-Up
programme.desc: From serving as conversation partners for the elderly to helping people walk again, AI robots are revolutionizing nursing care in Japan. We look at how they could spread to other parts of daily life.

programme.title: Seasoning the Seasons
programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.title: Herbal Symphony #3 Autumn
programme.desc: In Uda, discover Japan's oldest private medicinal herb garden, where the natural landscape from 300 years ago is preserved in a botanical time capsule, a sanctuary of the local culture and history.

programme.title: Medical Frontiers
programme.desc: Periodontal disease-causing bacteria are hard to eliminate. A device developed in Japan uses hydrogen peroxide and blue light. Work is also underway to regenerate periodontal tissue using stem cells.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 5
programme.desc: A deadly bin puts all the buyers on edge. It's a bad omen that casts a dark shadow over the day. As the day winds to a fever pitch, Brandon and Lori square off against Scott and Chrissy in a do or die bidding war that sends all strategy out the window. And later, our competitors uncover a high-tech find they think could worth thousands. But all that glitters may not be gold.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S2 1
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys return to White Castle to serve up a new round of mischief, pose as bouncers at a nightclub, and offer phony horoscope readings in a mall.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S2 2
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys try to sell diamonds to unsuspecting couples ready to tie the knot, and pose as members of a very unwelcoming committee down at the boardwalk.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 07
programme.desc: Michael and his fellow employees debate the authenticity of a giant lizard and find a game with a very specific target audience. Then at the diner, he adds some spice to lunch time and gives patrons the chills while demonstrating a new way to cool soup. Finally at the furniture store, Michael shows his coworker that impossible things can happen in the blink of an eye.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 08
programme.desc: In this special crossover event, the Impractical Jokers help Michael stun coffee bar customers - but soon discover the joke is on them! Plus, Michael's woodland creatures display fantastic hidden abilities.

programme.title: The Fresh Prince Of Bel-Air S1 17
programme.desc: When Will complains that no black history is taught in his school, Vivian Banks takes on the job temporarily, and both Will and Carlton find out they are in for a lot of hard work.

programme.title: Georgie & Mandy's First Marriage S1 17
programme.desc: Georgies attempt to break up Missy and her new boyfriend backfires.

programme.title: The West Wing S1 1
programme.desc: The White House senior members handle difficult situations.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 4
programme.desc: Big money brings out fierce competition at a rare high-stakes RV auction. Then, the contents of a locker spill out at our bidders' feet, smashing several dangerous objects. Will it bring seven years of bad luck, or a 7-figure payday? And later, Jesse's experience with antiques makes him think treasures lie behind the iron curtain.

programme.desc: When Will complains that no black history is taught in his school, Vivian Banks takes on the job temporarily, and both Will and Carlton find out they are in for a lot of hard work.

programme.title: Georgie & Mandy's First Marriage S1 17
programme.desc: Georgies attempt to break up Missy and her new boyfriend backfires.

programme.title: Er S1 25
programme.desc: Greene is sued for malpractice. Benton offers Carter a surgical internship, and Swift offers Greene an attending job for next year. Tag and Hathaway prepare for their wedding day.

programme.title: Cobra
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone plays his toughest character yet as a police officer dirtier than Harry, who must protect a beautiful witness from a cult of serial killers.

programme.title: Er S1 25
programme.desc: Greene is sued for malpractice. Benton offers Carter a surgical internship, and Swift offers Greene an attending job for next year. Tag and Hathaway prepare for their wedding day.

programme.title: The Fresh Prince Of Bel-Air S1 17
programme.desc: When Will complains that no black history is taught in his school, Vivian Banks takes on the job temporarily, and both Will and Carlton find out they are in for a lot of hard work.

programme.title: Georgie & Mandy's First Marriage S1 17
programme.desc: Georgies attempt to break up Missy and her new boyfriend backfires.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S2 1
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys return to White Castle to serve up a new round of mischief, pose as bouncers at a nightclub, and offer phony horoscope readings in a mall.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S2 2
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys try to sell diamonds to unsuspecting couples ready to tie the knot, and pose as members of a very unwelcoming committee down at the boardwalk.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 7
programme.desc: This hour, the joke's on you... and on 20 of the World's Dumbest Pranksters. Their tricks include everything from a terrifying wake up call, to telekinesis, and a not-so-dead body in the trunk of a taxi. With real jokes provided by our cast of hilarious comedians, including Mike Trainor, Chris Fairbanks, and Katlyn Carlson.

programme.title: The West Wing S1 1
programme.desc: The White House senior members handle difficult situations.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 4
programme.desc: Big money brings out fierce competition at a rare high-stakes RV auction. Then, the contents of a locker spill out at our bidders' feet, smashing several dangerous objects. Will it bring seven years of bad luck, or a 7-figure payday? And later, Jesse's experience with antiques makes him think treasures lie behind the iron curtain.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 5
programme.desc: A deadly bin puts all the buyers on edge. It's a bad omen that casts a dark shadow over the day. As the day winds to a fever pitch, Brandon and Lori square off against Scott and Chrissy in a do or die bidding war that sends all strategy out the window. And later, our competitors uncover a high-tech find they think could worth thousands. But all that glitters may not be gold.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 07
programme.desc: Michael and his fellow employees debate the authenticity of a giant lizard and find a game with a very specific target audience. Then at the diner, he adds some spice to lunch time and gives patrons the chills while demonstrating a new way to cool soup. Finally at the furniture store, Michael shows his coworker that impossible things can happen in the blink of an eye.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 08
programme.desc: In this special crossover event, the Impractical Jokers help Michael stun coffee bar customers - but soon discover the joke is on them! Plus, Michael's woodland creatures display fantastic hidden abilities.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 7
programme.desc: This hour, the joke's on you... and on 20 of the World's Dumbest Pranksters. Their tricks include everything from a terrifying wake up call, to telekinesis, and a not-so-dead body in the trunk of a taxi. With real jokes provided by our cast of hilarious comedians, including Mike Trainor, Chris Fairbanks, and Katlyn Carlson.

programme.title: The Fresh Prince Of Bel-Air S1 17
programme.desc: When Will complains that no black history is taught in his school, Vivian Banks takes on the job temporarily, and both Will and Carlton find out they are in for a lot of hard work.

programme.title: Georgie & Mandy's First Marriage S1 17
programme.desc: Georgies attempt to break up Missy and her new boyfriend backfires.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S2 3
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys share humiliating text messages in a quiet waiting room, shampoo women's hair at an upscale hair salon, and teach a driver's ed course that's a guaranteed fail.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S2 4
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys put their green thumbs to the test as workers in a garden center, demonstrate how NOT to save lives as CPR instructors, and they're full of baloney workinga deli counter.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 8
programme.desc: Put Thomas Edison to shame with 20 of the World's Smartest Inventions - from a bird feeder with a shocking high-voltage surprise, to a bowl made entirely of bacon, and a whacky way to grow bananas at home. With innovative commentary from our cast ofhilarious comedians, including Mike O'Gorman, Jared Logan and Judy Gold.

programme.title: The West Wing S1 2
programme.desc: Leo hires Mandy as a consultant to the President.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 6
programme.desc: Cash flies over a locker that reveals a high-ticket mystery item. Then, everyone digs deep to win an ATM, but when the dust settles will this thing be filled with big bucks or major regret? And later, the unlikeliest of duos team up with a strategy that leaves our buyers' heads spinning.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 7
programme.desc: In Vegas, an old rivalry resurfaces. Then, a locker reveals a covered item that's thought to be a vintage car, but when the bidding ends will the buyer drive away with a fortune or stall out in failure? And later, it's every man for himself when a unit full of gemstones ignites an all out war among the competition.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings - Episode 234
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Melissa Mackay.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 234
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Kathryn Robinson brings you today's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter most.

programme.title: On Country Kitchen - Episode 2
programme.desc: Derek starts out with a fun way to harvest cabbages, he then helps prepare smoked meats, and helps a beekeeper put a queen bee into a new hive! Then we hear special sounds of two didgeridoo's in the Boranup Forest.

programme.title: Field To Feast - Episode 7
programme.desc: Thanh unearths some of the secrets behind this emerging vegetable that is very popular internationally. Thanh then enjoys a traditional home-cooked, African dish that features Okra as the star.

programme.title: Wide Open Spaces - Remote Snappers
programme.desc: Ever wished you could ditch the office job for something a bit more magical? For two young Australians, their day jobs involve swimming with dolphins in the Gulf of Carpentaria and sleeping under the stars in the outback.

programme.title: A Brief History Of Cricket Down Under: The 80s - Gaining The Edge
programme.desc: New bat technology, the key to reverse-swing, slow bowling and team culture are all crucial elements in a quality team's march to victory. This episode reveals the ways teams playing in the '80s found that winning edge.

programme.title: Restoration Australia - Prahran Boarding
programme.desc: Host Anthony Burke joins a young couple, Steph and Paul, as they set out bravely and optimistically to write a happy, luxe new chapter for a storied 150-year-old Melbourne institution.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing - Episode 216
programme.desc: Your daily download of everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs. Patricia Karvelas asks politicians the tough questions and talks to key players and experts on the issues driving the news cycle.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien - Episode 216
programme.desc: Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: On Country Kitchen - Episode 2
programme.desc: Derek starts out with a fun way to harvest cabbages, he then helps prepare smoked meats, and helps a beekeeper put a queen bee into a new hive! Then we hear special sounds of two didgeridoo's in the Boranup Forest.

programme.title: Field To Feast - Episode 7
programme.desc: Thanh unearths some of the secrets behind this emerging vegetable that is very popular internationally. Thanh then enjoys a traditional home-cooked, African dish that features Okra as the star.

programme.title: Rural Flavours - Dairy Rum
programme.desc: Modern dairy farms look to high-tech technology to increase milk production. A Sunshine Coast farm has found a low-tech way. It's feeding its stock 'dunder' - a by-product from a very local distillery.

programme.title: ABC National News - Episode 328
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the day's top stories and latest news, with more reporters to tell you what's going on and why it matters. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: 7.30 - Episode 185
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus reporting from Michael Rowland, Jacob Greber and the team.

programme.title: Australia Remastered: Wild Kakadu - Wild Kakadu
programme.desc: A year in the life of Kakadu in Australia's Top End. Aaron Pedersen explains the six seasons recognised by the Bininj people and reveals the web of relationships between its species and the environment.

programme.title: The World - Episode 185
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from ABC News correspondents as well as interviews with experts and guests.

programme.title: Restoration Australia - Prahran Boarding
programme.desc: Host Anthony Burke joins a young couple, Steph and Paul, as they set out bravely and optimistically to write a happy, luxe new chapter for a storied 150-year-old Melbourne institution.

programme.title: Planet America - Episode 38
programme.desc: From a Gaza ceasefire to 'Liberation Day' tariffs, an immigration crackdown, the longest government shutdown, DOGE, MAGA, peace deals, Epstein, the National Guard, media and more - it's been a packed year. (Final for 2025)

programme.title: Field To Feast - Episode 7
programme.desc: Thanh unearths some of the secrets behind this emerging vegetable that is very popular internationally. Thanh then enjoys a traditional home-cooked, African dish that features Okra as the star.

programme.title: ABC Late News - Episode 234
programme.desc: Follow the story with the latest on the day's events, explaining what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe uncovering what you need to know. Presented by Michael Tetlow.

programme.title: The Business - Episode 173
programme.desc: Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: 7.30 - Episode 185
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus reporting from Michael Rowland, Jacob Greber and the team.

programme.title: The World - Episode 185
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from ABC News correspondents as well as interviews with experts and guests.

programme.title: Planet America - Episode 38
programme.desc: From a Gaza ceasefire to 'Liberation Day' tariffs, an immigration crackdown, the longest government shutdown, DOGE, MAGA, peace deals, Epstein, the National Guard, media and more - it's been a packed year. (Final for 2025)

programme.title: A Brief History Of Cricket Down Under: The 80s - Gaining The Edge
programme.desc: New bat technology, the key to reverse-swing, slow bowling and team culture are all crucial elements in a quality team's march to victory. This episode reveals the ways teams playing in the '80s found that winning edge.

programme.title: Unusual Farmers - Abalone Rancher

programme.title: News Breakfast - Episode 235
programme.desc: As the day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. Bridget Brennan and James Glenday bring you the latest news, overnight developments and today's top stories, joined by Charles Brice, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings - Episode 235
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: A rookie cop spends his first day as a Los Angeles narcotics officer with a rogue detective who isn't what he appears to be.

programme.title: Irma La Douce
programme.desc: In 1713 Scotland, Rob Roy MacGregor is wronged by a nobleman and his nephew, becomes an outlaw in search of revenge while fleeing the Redcoats, and faces charges of being a Jacobite.

programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: Ruth Patchett, an unattractive housewife, learns that her husband is having an affair and sets out to exact revenge on his mistress, a glamorous novelist.

programme.title: Copycat
programme.desc: A rookie cop spends his first day as a Los Angeles narcotics officer with a rogue detective who isn't what he appears to be.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: An American missionary and his wife travel to the exotic island kingdom of Hawaii, intent on converting the natives. But the clash between the two cultures is too great and instead of understanding there comes tragedy.

programme.title: Irma La Douce
programme.desc: After witnessing his parents' death, billionaire Bruce Wayne learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: A comet is discovered to be on a collision course with Earth. As doomsday nears, the human race prepares for the worst.

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: This classic confrontation between good and evil and stars Kevin Costner as federal agent Ness, Robert De Niro as gangland kingpin Al Capone & Sean Connery as Malone who teaches Ness how to beat the mob.

programme.title: The Chronicles Of Riddick
programme.desc: An American missionary and his wife travel to the exotic island kingdom of Hawaii, intent on converting the natives. But the clash between the two cultures is too great and instead of understanding there comes tragedy.

programme.title: Saw III
programme.desc: After witnessing his parents' death, billionaire Bruce Wayne learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

programme.title: CNA
programme.desc: Channel NewsAsia Singapore was established in March 1999 by Mediacorp, and is an English language Asian TV News channel. Positioned to Understand Asia, it reports on global developments with Asian perspectives. Channel NewsAsia brings viewers not only the latest news but also the stories behind the headlines. Based in Singapore, it has correspondents in major Asian cities and key Western ones, including New York, Washington D.C., London and Brussels. The channel is complemented by an online presence at channelnewsasia.com, and social media services like Facebook, YouTube and Twitter. Channel NewsAsia (International), was launched in September 2000. It is now viewed in 27 territories across Asia with its satellite footprint stretching across the Middle East, South Asia, Southeast Asia, Northeast Asia and Australia. Mediacorp is a Singapore-based media company with a complete range of platforms, spanning television, radio, newspapers, magazines, digital and out-of-home media. For more information, please visit Channel NewsAsias website at channelnewsasia.com.

programme.title: Midnight Ruins
programme.desc: Fallen painter Cheng Zihao is asked to investigate the strange events that occurred during the rehearsal of a play "Song of the Night" by an old friend. This play was rehearsed by them in the past, and has brought him many pains and nightmares. As Cheng Zihao uncovers the truth, he is shocked by the same story of love and hate after so many years

programme.title: The Ones You Didn't Burn
programme.desc: After their father's death, Nathan and his sister return to their family home to prepare it for sale. While there, Nathan discovers that the land was stolen from the ancestors of two women accused of witchcraft. As he delves deeper, he uncovers an occult conspiracy linked to their father's death which now threatens them both.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Lonely Ah Zhen is bullied by his coworkers. When he spends his birthday with Yumi, his friends shockingly discover that Yumi is an inflatable doll. Seeking companionship, Ah Zhen turns to the internet and finds his ideal girl Mina. Her arrival transforms his life but a series of unexpected events unfold as her identity as a vampire is revealed.

programme.title: Night at the Eagle Inn
programme.desc: A pair of fraternal twins spend a terrifying night in a remote inn to investigate the last known whereabouts of their father who mysteriously disappeared the night they were born. As they dive deeper, the property's dark secrets ensnare them in a hellish labyrinth which they must escape before dawn.

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: A high school cheerleader, Ashley, is adopted by the killers who murdered her parents. She is horrified to find out the truth during a home robbery years later, and must choose to either escape or be part of this family for good.

programme.title: Zombie Island
programme.desc: Jeff, a big fan of zombies, goes to a deserted and mysterious island with his friends hoping to seek out exciting adventures. What started as an adventure turns out to be a horrifying journey as they get trapped on the island and are attacked by the zombies! Their lives are in danger when they fail to fight back, and the game has only just begun!

programme.title: Midnight Ruins
programme.desc: Fallen painter Cheng Zihao is asked to investigate the strange events that occurred during the rehearsal of a play "Song of the Night" by an old friend. This play was rehearsed by them in the past, and has brought him many pains and nightmares. As Cheng Zihao uncovers the truth, he is shocked by the same story of love and hate after so many years

As they dive deeper, the property's dark secrets ensnare them in a hellish labyrinth which they must escape before dawn.

programme.title: The Possession of Leah Dela Cruz
programme.desc: A female cop moves into a small town, and gets drawn to a case that involves a girl who is possessed by an evil spirit.

programme.title: Lost Memories
programme.desc: As a young mother grapples with her daughter's mysterious disappearance, a series of eerie events unfold. These events could be linked to the vengeful ghosts of a tragic accident that happened 20 years ago...

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: The Hungry Ghost Festival is around the corner. A newcomer at a workplace offends the ghosts in his office building when he shows disrespect for the spirits on his first day at work. In the course of a night shift, the man and his colleagues working overtime experience spooky encounters that make them reflect on their behaviours and beliefs...

programme.title: Chop Chop
programme.desc: A young couple's tranquility is shattered by a psychotic serial killer one quiet evening. Their battle for survival reveals hidden truths, entangling them unwittingly with the criminal underworld.

programme.title: Sinister Doll
programme.desc: A teenager, Pelangi, chances upon a banana tree plantation which is guarded by a mysterious old man. Apart from finding out that a young girl was buried with her favourite doll in this banana plantation decades ago, Pelangi also uncovers a horrifying secret about her death

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A taxi driver who is constantly judging others by his own standards, also reads into their every move and sets out to help victims in his own way. When a woman he likes seems to be bullied by her son, he goes about setting things right for her, even resorting to turning himself into a cold-blooded serial killer

programme.title: The Possession of Leah Dela Cruz
programme.desc: A female cop moves into a small town, and gets drawn to a case that involves a girl who is possessed by an evil spirit.

programme.title: Lost Memories
programme.desc: As a young mother grapples with her daughter's mysterious disappearance, a series of eerie events unfold. These events could be linked to the vengeful ghosts of a tragic accident that happened 20 years ago...

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)
programme.desc: Reselling scrap junk became very hard as the market for scrap metal pays much less and so Andy had talked his mother into getting a reverse mortgage on the property.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: A 73-year-old murder suspect trashes the interrogation room; a married mother of three admits to a 26-year-old cold case killing; and more.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: Investigators interrogate a prison inmate about an unsolved serial killer case from the 90s; a former police sergeant is questioned about the murder of his mistress; and more.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S1)
programme.desc: After a young father is brutally beaten and left to die on the side of a road, four acquaintances are interrogated separately and the finger-pointing begins.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S3)
programme.desc: After police respond to a shooting in Chicago, a man is arrested and charged. He claims that he was attacked with a hammer before reaching for his weapon.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S4)
programme.desc: A woman faces life in prison when a passenger in the car she is driving is killed after she collides with an 18-wheel truck. Was she an intoxicated driver, or was it a tragic accident?

programme.title: Cold Case Files: Murder In The Bayou
programme.desc: When Betty Jones, 65, and Kathryn Crigler, 81, are brutally attacked in a 1990 home invasion, the tiny community of Starkville, MS, is left living in fear.

programme.title: Undercover: Caught On Tape
programme.desc: In the sunny cities of Daytona and Cocoa, ATF Special Agent Perala is reminded of the importance of listening to your gut. His life is threatened when suspects turn the tables on him.

programme.title: Tell Me How I Died
programme.desc: During a welfare check, authorities discover a man has been living with the mummified bodies of his family. Pathologists cannot determine if they died naturally or if something nefarious occurred.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: Tim and Barbara Pasa meet at a gig Tim is performing at and quickly fall for one another. Barbara is a surgical nurse by day, a fun-loving party animal. They marry quickly, shocking their friends.

programme.title: Accused: Did I Do It?
programme.desc: A frightening assault ends in tragedy when teenagers shoot splat ball guns at two brothers playing a nighttime basketball game. A fight ensues between the youths, leaving a 17-year-old dead at the scene.

programme.title: The First 48 (S25)
programme.desc: In Tulsa, one man is killed and another is injured when a dispute over stolen marijuana plants turns deadly.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S2)
programme.desc: Stay-at-home mom Danielle Redlick was arrested and charged with 2nd Degree Murder and Tampering with Physical Evidence in the death of her husband, pro sports executive Michael Redlick.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: Christine and Jason Harris fell in love young. Christina finds Jason caring and supportive and after marrying, they have two children. But then Christina makes a shocking discovery.

programme.title: City Confidential (S8)
programme.desc: The husband and father of a murdered family attacks their killer in court; a judge has no patience for a foul-mouthed defendant; a convicted drunk driver begs the judge for mercy; and more.

programme.title: CI Asia: Missing In Bali
programme.desc: When 8-year-old Engeline mysteriously disappears, police, the public and a clairvoyant uncover dark secrets as they search for her.

programme.title: The Last Woman Standing ep 5

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Hindi Pa Tapos ang Laban
programme.desc: Fernando Poe Jr. stars as Carding Villamar, a city professional who returns to their hometown of Evangelista after learning of his brother's untimely demise. As a series of events unfold, he soon discovers that his brother didn't succumb to a heart attack as he was made to believe. He was shot in cold blood for refusing to sell his land to a powerful congressman. With a town muted and crippled by fear, the congressman's henchmen move unhampered to silence Carding and his brother's orphaned family as well. Big mistake. Armed with only a crusty riffle and a whole ton of rage. Carding sets out to right the wrong and exact vengeance for the murder of his brother. That is, if he survives the hot pursuits of bounty hunters, the militia and the police who are all in the congressman's payroll.

programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 11

programme.title: Room 514
programme.desc: When Anna, a young, idealistic Israeli military investigator, confronts an elite officer with accusations of unnecessary violence against a Palestinian man in the Occupied Territories, her integrity and determination are challenged.

programme.title: Sweet Dreams
programme.desc: Dutch tycoon Jan dies suddenly in Indonesia, leaving his wife Agathe in shock. Their son and his pregnant wife come from the Netherlands to inherit the family empire and are dismayed to find out that Jan's mistress Siti has a crucial role in his will.

programme.title: Passenger 23
programme.desc: Martin, a police psychologist who lost his wife and his son during a vacation, receives a call that brings new clues about the disappearance of his family and returns to the same cruise ship to discover the truth.

programme.title: Murder in Biot
programme.desc: A wealthy heiress is poisoned during a dinner of the Biot Trade Association. All the guests are potential suspects. Two days later, one of the guests dies leaving a suicide note and confessing to the murder. But Deputy Prosecutor Richard is unconvinced.

programme.title: Djam
programme.desc: Djam, a bold young Greek woman, travels to Istanbul to look for an engine part for her uncles boat. She meets a stranded and penniless Avril, who is a volunteer for Syrian refugees. Together, they embark on a lively, music-filled journey to Mytilene.

programme.title: Cracks In Concrete
programme.desc: Ertan leaves jail after 10 years and tries to settle back in society. Mikail spends his time with parties, drugs and dreaming of a life as a gangster rapper. Ertan looks for Mikail. Mikail doesn't know Ertan. Soon they must face a harsh reality.

programme.title: Man And A Baby
programme.desc: Dad (Antti) is left alone with a newborn after the mom (Pia) decides motherhood is not her thing. Single dad tries to survive alone in "women's world" and keep the baby and himself alive.

programme.title: Tokyo Fianc e
programme.desc: A charming and tender tale of young love and cultural discovery. Amlie, a Japanophile young Belgian woman in Tokyo falls into a whirlwind romance with Rinri, a Francophile Japanese student.

programme.title: Our Children
programme.desc: A doctor brings a boy to Belgium and raises him as his own. When the boy reaches manhood, he gets married and starts his own family, but he still relies on the doctor, his adoptive father. When trouble strikes his family, dependence turns into domination.

programme.title: The Traveller: The Valley of Fear
programme.desc: In the Basque Country, Captain Yann Kandinsky investigates the disappearance of a young bookseller whose case mirrors a murder from twenty years earlier. All evidence points to the same manYves Cesnoz, convicted of the first crimebut Kandinsky believes the real killer is still at large.

programme.title: Murder in Kermadec
programme.desc: A man is found dead at the foot of a cliff in a small quiet fishing village. Captain Breguet who wanted to leave the region will have to stay a little longer to solve this crime. She will find a mysterious man on her way and fight to protect her daughter.

programme.title: Red Eagle
programme.desc: A Summit between France, England, Portugal and the Pope is to take place in Spain, under the guise of looking for a solution to the conflict between Spain and Portugal; but the ulterior motive is to attack the Kingdom of Spain.

programme.title: Midnight At The Paradise
programme.desc: Over the course of one evening, three couples are pulled into a collision course of sexual chemistry, delusion, forgiveness and hope as they explore what love, death, desire and the magic of the movies mean to them.

programme.title: East Frisian: Atonement
programme.desc: Detective Ann Kathrin Klaasen grapples with her father's unsolved murder, which still haunts her after fifteen years. After much urging from her concerned partner Frank Wellerto to seek help, she heads to a doctor, where she notices a clue in the office.
